Description[edit]

DescriptionFlag of Belize.svg
English: The flag of Belize.
Deutsch: Die Flagge Belizes.
Suomi: Belizen lippu.
Français : Drapeau du Belize.
Latina: Vexillium Belizae.
Italiano: Bandiera del Belize.
Nederlands: De vlag van Belize.
Русский: Флаг Белиза
Slovenščina: državna zastava Belizeja.
Date 31 December 1981
Source
  • Used as Air Force insigna seen here
  • Improved version from xrmap flag collection 2.9.
